response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it at a special price of $7,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 7500}
